no-results.title: No results found
no-results.content: We did not find any relevant research papers related to your search term. It appears to be a random string or an identifier that does not match current academic topics or standard terminology.

not-a-question.title: Search term not a question
not-a-question.content: Without a clear, legible research question, I cannot formulate a meaningful response. Please try rephrasing your search as a question.

typo.title: Possible typo detected
typo.content: It looks like there might be a typo in your search. Please check your spelling and try again.

not-in-database.title: Not found in database
not-in-database.content: We couldn't find any matches for your search in our database. Try using different keywords or check your search term.

error-500.title: Server error
error-500.content: We encountered an error processing your request. Please try again in a few moments.

error-generic.title: Something went wrong
error-generic.content: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

empty-search.title: Start your search
empty-search.content: Enter a search term to find relevant information.
